alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tooele County through 1000 PM MDT... At 920 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wendover, moving east northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated and surface observation confirmed. At 9:14PM MDT, a wind gust to 56 mph was measured at Wendover Airport. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may reduce visibility for those traveling on Interstate 80. Locations impacted include... Wendover and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 19. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
